scripts.db:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d minio minio-setup
scripts.db:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml stop minio minio-setup || true
scripts.db:e2e:up: echo "Using local MariaDB from DATABASE_URL/E2E_DATABASE_URL (default port 3306)."
scripts.db:e2e:down: echo "No dedicated E2E DB container to stop."
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:up && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:setup:push: npm run db:up && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: prisma migrate reset --force --skip-seed && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:setup:local: npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:setup:push:local: npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset:local: prisma db push --force-reset && npm run db:seed
